page.title: 15Wednesbury South Central.
page.content: A largely commercial block with many shops and industry to the South West. {Telfords Holyhead Road}cuts across the block from South East to North West. {Walsall Street}and{Union Street}are now bypassed so the central shopping area has no through traffic.{St John's {Church}is at present being demolished. St John's primary school is now in new premises (1983). The open market is still held and there is a new covered market off{The Shambles.}The site of the Town Hall has the art gallery and a new careers office and the West Midlands Police have a new regional station nearby. Lloyds bank at the bottom of Lower High Street has a preservation order. The national administration centre for {GKN Steelstock}is in Potters Lane. Part of the now derelict Patent Shaft site is off Leabrook Road.
